commit.message:
Switching the whole DashPay to protobuf-javalite.
Re-enabling Firebase In-App Messaging.

nodes.bodyText: FirebaseInstanceId.getInstance().getId() requires additional dependency - 'com.google.firebase:firebase-messaging:20.2.4'. Additionally we do not use this version of AboutFragment.java anymore.
Compiler doesn't complain so I removed this line.
